sections.name: Tamikan
sections.text: This creature did not include a description.

traits.name: Unique
traits.text: A rules element with this trait is one-of-a-kind. The DC of Recall Knowledge checks related to creatures with this trait is increased by 10.

traits.name: Dragon
traits.text: Dragons are reptilian creatures, often winged or with the power of flight. Most are able to use a breath weapon and are immune to sleep and paralysis.

link.name: Pathfinder #166: Despair on Danger Island pg. 39
link.alt: Pathfinder #166: Despair on Danger Island pg. 39

modifiers.name: +1 status to all saves vs. magic

traits.name: Magical
traits.text:
Something with the magical trait is imbued with magical energies not tied to a specific tradition of magic. A magical item radiates a magic aura infused with its dominant school of magic.  
  
 Some items or effects are closely tied to a particular tradition of magic. In these cases, the item has the arcane, divine, occult, or primal trait instead of the magical trait. Any of these traits indicate that the item is magical.

traits.name: Reach
traits.text: Natural attacks with this trait can be used to attack creatures up to the listed distance away instead of only adjacent creatures. Weapons with this trait are long and can be used to attack creatures up to 10 feet away instead of only adjacent creatures. For creatures that already have reach with the limb or limbs that wield the weapon, the weapon increases their reach by 5 feet.

traits.name: Agile
traits.text: The multiple attack penalty you take with this weapon on the second attack on your turn is –4 instead of –5, and –8 instead of –10 on the third and subsequent attacks in the turn.

Weapons with this trait are long and can be used to attack creatures up to 10 feet away instead of only adjacent creatures. For creatures that already have reach with the limb or limbs that wield the weapon, the weapon increases their reach by 5 feet.

ability.name: Boat Breaker
ability.text: A kongamato's beak is supernaturally hard. Their beak Strikes ignore half the Hardness of any object they hit.

ability.name: Flying Strafe
ability.text: The kongamato Flies up to their fly Speed and makes two wing Strikes at any point during that movement. Each Strike must target a different creature.

ability.name: Sonic Screech

traits.name: Arcane
traits.text: This magic comes from the arcane tradition, which is built on logic and rationality. Anything with this trait is magical.

traits.name: Evocation
traits.text: Effects and magic items with this trait are associated with the evocation school of magic, typically involving energy and elemental forces.

traits.name: Sonic
traits.text: An effect with the sonic trait functions only if it makes sound, meaning it has no effect in an area of silence or in a vacuum. This is different from an auditory spell, which is effective only if the target can hear it. A sonic effect might deal sonic damage. A creature with this trait has a magical connection to powerful sound.

ability.text: Tamikan unleashes a powerful and deadly blast of sonic force from her maw that deals 12d6 sonic damage in a 100- foot line (DC 37 basic Reflex save). She can't use Sonic Screech again for 1d4 rounds.

ability.name: Wailing Dive
ability.text: The kongamato Flies while emitting a terrifying screech. Each creature the kongamato flies over must succeed at a DC 37 Will save or become frightened 1 (frightened 2 on a critical failure). After attempting their saves, the creatures are temporarily immune for 1 hour. At the end of their movement, the kongamato can make a beak Strike.
